User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the system.

phoneNumber.description: The user's phone number, preferably WhatsApp.

role.description: Role of the user (e.g., 'user', 'admin', 'developer', 'superadmin'). Default is 'user'.

CoursePrice.title: Course Price
CoursePrice.description: Defines the pricing for a course.

Lecturer.title: Lecturer
Lecturer.description: Represents a lecturer who teaches courses.

imageUrl.description: URL of the lecturer's profile image.

payoutRate.description: Percentage of revenue to be paid out to the lecturer.

pricing.description: Maps course IDs to their specific prices for this lecturer across different currencies.

Booking.title: Booking
Booking.description: Represents a user's booking for a course.

userPhoneNumber.description: The phone number of the user who made the booking.

duration.description: Duration of the class in hours (1 or 2).

isReviewed.description: Indicates if the student has left a review for this booking.

AdminSettings.title: AdminSettings
AdminSettings.description: Stores global settings configurable by an admin.

whatsappContactUrl.description: Full WhatsApp chat link for student contact.

disabledDates.description: An array of dates (YYYY-MM-DD) that are unavailable for booking.

Schedule.title: Schedule
Schedule.description: Represents the booked time slots for a specific day for a lecturer.

lecturerId.description: The ID of the lecturer this schedule belongs to.

date.description: The date for this schedule in YYYY-MM-DD format.

timeSlots.description: An array of time slots that are available for this day.

bookedSlots.description: An array of 30-minute time blocks that are booked for this day.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a chat message within a booking.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

senderName.description: The display name of the sender.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

Review.title: Review
Review.description: A student review for a lecturer.

ActivityLog.title: Activity Log
ActivityLog.description: Records administrative actions performed in the system for audit purposes.

actorId.description: The UID of the user who performed the action.

actorName.description: The name of the user who performed the action.

action.description: A dot-notation string representing the action (e.g., 'booking.confirm').

entityId.description: The ID of the document or entity that was affected.

details.description: An object containing relevant data about the action.

targetUserId.description: Optional UID of the user who was the subject of the action.

targetUserName.description: Optional name of the subject user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

params.description: The composite key for the schedule document.

firestore.reasoning: The data structure is revised for lecturer-centric pricing and scheduling. Course pricing is moved from the 'Course' entity to a 'pricing' map within the 'Lecturer' entity, allowing each lecturer to have different prices for the same course. The 'Schedule' entity is now independent of courses; its ID is a composite of '{lecturerId}_{YYYY-MM-DD}' to represent a lecturer's general availability for a given day, simplifying the booking logic and making it more robust. This change enables the new booking flow where a user selects a lecturer first, then a time, and finally the course.
